title: How to Reshape Your Photos With Cartoonist

steps.headline: Go to the download site and download the program.
Install it wherever you choose it to go.
Open your intended victim....rather, your future masterpiece in the program.
steps.description: It doesn't allow to you to paste into the program.

steps.headline: Change the warp to adjust the changes that you make.
Note the size of the circle.
steps.description: It indicates the size of the 'warp factor'.

steps.headline: Reset  your image if you want to continue to fool around but want a fresh pallet.
Have fun with all of the images you can make!!

text: Go to the download site and download the program.  Install it wherever you choose it to go.  Open your intended victim....rather, your future masterpiece in the program. It doesn't allow to you to paste into the program. Change the warp to adjust the changes that you make.  Start experimenting.  Note the size of the circle. It indicates the size of the 'warp factor'. Reset  your image if you want to continue to fool around but want a fresh pallet.  Have fun with all of the images you can make!! !
